title: is warwick still strong in top lane.
body: with the higher increase of top champions with ranged poke, is Warwick as a top laner losing viability? his ability as a jungler is already known, but I like to bring him top sometimes.

replies.body: Warwick has mana issues if you want to take him into lane. There are better options if you want a sustain champion at top.

He has the ability to sustain top lane pretty well but when it comes fighting most top laners in the early game Warwick just has tons of trouble keeping up in terms of damage. As for the ranged part of your question that is a yes. Champions such as Jayce,Quinn,and Hell even maybe Urgot can zone him out pretty damn hard.
